original_text: He may say that you should start to worship other gods that you did not know about before. The miracles may happen, as he promised, 3 but do not listen to that prophet's message. The Lord your God is using this person to test your thoughts. He wants to know if you really love him in everything that you think and everything that you do.
korean_text: 그가 네게 말한 그 이적과 기사가 이루어지고 너희가 알지 못하던 다른 신들을 우리가 따라 섬기자고 말할지라도

sentences.original_text: He may say that you should start to worship other gods
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 다른 신들을 섬기기 시작해야 한다고 말할 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: that you did not know about before
but do not listen to that prophet's message
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그 예언자의 메시지를 듣지 마세요

sentences.original_text: The Lord your God is using this person
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 주 하나님은 이 사람을 사용하고 계십니다
